name: Bob's Three Bean Salad
author: Kenneth Isakson
summary: This is a very simple recipe to make and it takes very little time or expense to put it together. You can substitute any bean you would like of add additional varieties to make a four or five bean salad. It's your food, make it the way you would like.
ingredients: 2 (15 ounce) cans red kidney beans, drained
2 (15 ounce) cans cut green beans, drained
¼ cup olive oil, or more if needed
½ teaspoon salt, or to taste
directions: Combine red kidney beans, green beans, and garbanzo beans in a large bowl
Add onion, garlic, sugar, Italian seasoning, rice wine vinegar, balsamic vinegar, and olive oil; stir to coat
Marinate salad in refrigerator before serving, at least 1 hour
